-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | lens for Data.Time
--   
--   lens for Data.Time Currently, It works UTCTime only.
@package lens-time
@version 0.1.0.0

module Data.Time.Lens
class HasDate a
date :: HasDate a => Lens' a Day
dateLens :: (Integral b1, Functor f, Num b, HasDate a) => ((b1 -> Accessor b1 b1) -> (Integer, Int, Int) -> Accessor b1 (Integer, Int, Int)) -> (b -> Day -> Day) -> (b1 -> f b1) -> a -> f a
year :: HasDate a => Lens' a Integer
month :: HasDate a => Lens' a Int
day :: HasDate a => Lens' a Int
class HasTime a
time :: HasTime a => Lens' a TimeOfDay
hour :: HasTime a => Lens' a Int
minutes :: HasTime a => Lens' a Int
seconds :: HasTime a => Lens' a Pico
instance HasTime UTCTime
instance HasDate UTCTime
